Extbase\Persistence\QOM

Interface Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ConstraintInterface

Direct Known Subclasses:

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_AndInterface, Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ComparisonInterface, Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_NotInterface, Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_OrInterface, Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_StatementInterface
public interface Tx_Extbase_Persistence_QOM_ConstraintInterface

Filters the set of tuples formed by evaluating the query's sources and the joins between them.

To be included in the query results, a tuple must satisfy the constraint.

Package: Extbase
Subpackage: Persistence\QOM
